ygData.subject: Re: All those extra skills...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Oh, I wish!  Begging of 2000 might be enough... Kenross Cantoforjado, 40 songs, Innoruuk
ygData.messageBody:
> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kenneth E. Bachman [mailto:kbachman@...]
> Sent: Friday, January 21, 2000 12:28 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] All those extra skills...
>
> 6) Begging 77 now, never got more than a copper (well, I seem to recall
> having received a silver piece once, but I may be deluded), although I
> now get a copper more than half the time, it seems. Anyone with a
> higher skill who managed to get more? In terms of cash received, are
> there "good" begging targets and "bad" begging targets (other than pets
> and ships)?
>
> Lord Nagafen says, "Here Kenross! Take this tishan orb and LEAVE ME ALONE!"
>
> Sylly

Oh, I wish! Begging of 2000 might be enough...

Kenross Cantoforjado, 40 songs, Innoruuk
